name: CreateNativeTableField
description:
Create a field in a Native Ramp table.

Use this tool to add a new field (column) to a specified Native Ramp table. Ideal for customizing table structures to suit your data needs.

parameters.name: target_native_table_name
parameters.description: The name of the Native Ramp table where a new field will be created.

parameters.name: table_field_configuration
parameters.description: A JSON object with details for configuring a new field in the Native Ramp table, such as field type and constraints.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
